title: Gauss Elimination for Linear Systems Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Gauss elimination for solving linear systems.

questions.question: What is the main advantage of Gauss elimination?
questions.explanation: Gauss elimination works for systems of any size and type.

questions.question: What does the augmented matrix [A|B] represent?
What is forward elimination?
questions.explanation: Forward elimination creates an upper triangular system.

questions.question: What does a zero pivot indicate?
questions.explanation: Zero pivots may require row interchanges for numerical stability.

questions.question: What is back-substitution?
questions.explanation: Back-substitution solves variables starting from the last equation.
